to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Patch hunk rejection?
body:
Zipslack is very cool. I used to always have a DOS partition
as a rescue partition that could boot DOS or zipslack from 
the lilo menu. The umsdos idea was brilliant.

  -- Spie
